html:
LETTER OF APPOINTMENT

Name : {{doc.applicant_name}}
Date : {{frappe.utils.format_date(doc.offer_date)}}

We have pleasure in offering you employment as {{doc.designation}} in {{doc.department1}}, Subject to your
acceptance of the following terms and conditions.

  1. That the terms of this contract shall be on an open terms basis.
  2. That your employment will be deemed to commence from the date of joining.
  3. That your monthly Gross salary shall be Qr {{ doc.basic_salary_qar + doc.allowance }}) (ie. Basic Salary Qar {{doc.basic_salary_qar}}/-, + Allowance {{doc.allowance}})
  4. Shared Bachelor accommodation will be provided by the company
  5. You will be on probation for 3 months; on satisfactory completion of the probationary period your appointment will be confirmed.
  6. That you will be entitled to get leave of 30 days for each completed 1 year of employment
  7. That you will be eligible for no other leave than on medical grounds.
  8. That you will be provided with Company Transportation.
  9. That the Company will provide you return air ticket with leave salary (as per Qatar Labor Law) for
    every completed One year of service for yourself.
  10. That the company will provide the Medical card issued by Hamad Medical Corporation
  11. In case of extra leaves more than your allowed annual leaves the extra leave days allowances will deduct from
    your salary
  12. The Company will provide Insurance for injuries, disability or death during work or arising there from
    according to Qatar Labor Law
  13. That you will be available for employment anywhere in Qatar as the Company’s requirement dictate.
  14. That you should not undertake any other employment either paid or unpaid, either full time or part time while
    in this Company’s service.
  15. That this contract may be terminated with one month’s notice by either party. The Company also reserves the
    right to terminate your service without notice in the event of any breach of any conditions of this contract or on
    grounds of gross misconduct, breaking the laws of the Country or insubordination, in this event you will be
    immediately repatriated by the earliest possible means without prejudice to any claim for debt or damages that
    the Company may have against you
  16. Upon termination of your employment for any cause, or any reason whatsoever, you shall not for a period of next one year thereafter reside in Qatar undertake or carry on either alone or in partnership or be employed or interested directly in any capacity whatsoever the business carried on by this Company in Qatar.
  17. This contract shall be governed by the laws of Qatar.

In case the above terms and conditions are agreeable to you, kindly sign this contract in acceptance as indicated below and return signed copy for our records.

For And On Behalf of

{{doc.company}}


Manager-Finance & Accounts

I, hereby accept this contract with Al Shaghairi Trading & Contracting Co. W.L.L(Electra) under the terms and conditions mentioned above.


Employee Signature
Date of Joining : {{frappe.utils.format_date(doc.joining_date)}}
name: LETTER OF APPOINTMENT
